nodes.speaker: Ethan
nodes.text: Everyone around me already knows what they want to be. I feel like I'm falling behind.

nodes.speaker: Player
nodes.text: What worries you the most right now?

choices.text: Help him reflect on what he actually enjoys.
Tell him it's okay not to know yet.
Encourage him to compare less and focus on himself.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: You ask Ethan about moments when he feels curious or absorbed. Slowly, he starts listing things he enjoys.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: You remind Ethan that many people discover their path later than they expect. He exhales in relief.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: You point out that comparison hides effort and failure. Ethan nods, realizing he's been too hard on himself.
